infos.value: Where are they...? Where is Mont's group?
Lady Glaciela... How can that be?
I sensed something was off from the moment we set foot in the castle.
There is no evidence of a struggle here.
Then the castle gates were opened by...
Wezette soldiers. There is no other explanation.
I-impossible! Why would they do that?
Are the Leonis forces here within the castle somewhere...?
Perhaps they are not here at all.
They have to be here! They gave us their word just yesterday!
Whether we push on or retreat, this lot must be dealt with.
And then we'll find Mont's party!
